name: Wizard Jump (Declivever)
description:
I created this game to see just how far my knowledge in Godot has came along in 1 Year.  I was inspired by Vimlark's wizard update to his free asset pack, and this is what I came up with. I started this project when Vimlark released the Wizard Sprite 3 days ago.

The challenge I gave myself, is a one screen per level, small scale game.

It is a small little action platformer, where you collect orbs, fight monsters, and I even through in a not so serious boss at the end.  It has a pause system, Menu system, Button configuration, audio volume controls, checkpoints, and more. I released both a HTML5, and EXE version. Supports controllers, and full screen (does not effect aspect, but has black bars.).

Asset Credit for the ones I did not create:
